title: Terror Form
name: Morphrost - Terror Form
printed_effect:
Your opponents' Elestrals get -1 {attack} for each {frost}
Enchanting this Morphrost. When a player
activates a card effect that targets 1 or more
Morphrost you can discard a Morphrost in order
to Negate that effect and destroy that card.
effect: Your opponents' Elestrals get -1 {attack} for each {frost} Enchanting this Morphrost. When a player activates a card effect that targets a Morphrost you can discard a Morphrost in order to Negate that effect and destroy that card.
